channel.title: Comments on: Screen Shot 2012-12-31 at 10.13.27
channel.description: A place for my thoughts when I was starting to break into the information security feild

item.title: By: altermind
item.dc:creator: altermind
item.description: Ahahah, oh my god, then i'm not the only one that immediately contacts the support when they send me my password in plain text...
item.content:encoded: Ahahah, oh my god, then i’m not the only one that immediately contacts the support when they send me my password in plain text…

item.title: By: google.com
item.dc:creator: google.com
item.description: I’m not that much of a online reader to be honest but your blogs really nice, keep it up! I'll go ahead and bookmark your site to come back later. Cheers
item.content:encoded:
I’m not that much of a online reader to be honest
but your blogs really nice, keep it up! I’ll go ahead and bookmark your site to come back
later. Cheers
